changelog: Added new typing modes: Kid and Pro
Kid mode: Slow typing (15-25 WPM) with random spelling mistakes and corrections
Pro mode: Fast professional typing (~90 WPM)
Enhanced Human mode: More realistic typing patterns with variable speeds, natural pauses, and occasional typos
Improved typing rhythm simulation with momentum and fatigue effects
Character-specific delays based on keyboard layout difficulty
Updated UI to show all 4 typing modes with descriptions
AFK hour farming with customizable intervals
